abstract: Motorola’s new Talkabout T9580RSAME two-way radios offers emergency alerts through the handset in additions to normal walkie-talkie features.
snippet: Motorola’s new Talkabout T9580RSAME two-way radios offers emergency alerts through the handset in additions to normal walkie-talkie features.
lead_paragraph: Walkie-talkies have long been an alternative to cellphones for keeping in touch with family members and fellow adventurers on camping trips or Disney World jaunts  and without burning monthly minutes or suffering from lack of signal coverage. Motorola’s new Talkabout T9580RSAME two-way radios take communication even further by broadcasting emergency alerts through the handset as well.

headline.main: Walkie-Talkies for Chat and Emergency Alerts
headline.print_headline: Walkie-Talkies for Chat And Emergency Alerts
